```{r}

```

```{r cleaning}

# remove FIPS code since we already have county names

table(data_2024$Unreliable...4)
```



```{r}
library(usmap)

state_obesity <- data_2024 |> 
  select(State, `% Adults with Obesity`) |> 
  filter(!is.na(State), !is.na(`% Adults with Obesity`)) |> 
  group_by(State) |> 
  summarize(obesity_rate = mean(`% Adults with Obesity`, na.rm = TRUE))|> 
  rename(state = State) |>  # Rename to lowercase for plot_usmap() 
  arrange(obesity_rate)

plot_usmap(data = state_obesity, values = "obesity_rate", regions = "states") +
  scale_fill_continuous(
    low = "lightyellow", high = "darkred", name = "Obesity Rate (%)", label = scales::comma
  ) +
  labs(title = "Average Adult Obesity Rate by State (2024)",
       subtitle = "Based on County Health Rankings Data") +
  theme(legend.position = "right")

```
